name: Team Resources & Bookmarks 2024
content:
üîó Team Resources & Bookmarks

Last updated: March 21, 2024

üè¢ Company Resources

------------------

Internal Tools:

- JIRA: https://synergyos.atlassian.net

- Confluence: https://synergyos.atlassian.net/wiki

- GitLab: https://gitlab.synergyos.com

- Jenkins: https://ci.synergyos.com

Monitoring:

- Grafana: https://metrics.synergyos.com

- Sentry: https://sentry.synergyos.com

- Status Page: https://status.synergyos.com

Documentation:

- API Docs: https://api.synergyos.com/docs

- SDK Reference: https://sdk.synergyos.com

- Style Guide: https://design.synergyos.com

üîê Access & Credentials

---------------------

Development:

```env

STAGING_DB=postgres://user:pass@staging-db:5432/app

REDIS_URL=redis://cache.synergyos.com:6379

S3_BUCKET=synergyos-staging-assets

```

Test Accounts:

- Admin: admin@test.synergyos.com / see 1Password

- Demo: demo@test.synergyos.com / see 1Password

- API: Get from DevOps team

üë• Team Communication

--------------------

Slack Channels:

- #team-engineering

- #dev-help

- #deploys

- #monitoring

Meeting Links:

- Daily Standup: [Zoom Link - 9:30 AM PST]

- Sprint Planning: [Zoom Link - Every other Monday]

- Tech Talks: [Zoom Link - Wednesdays]

üìö Learning Resources

-------------------

Internal:

- Onboarding: https://wiki.synergyos.com/onboarding

- Architecture: https://wiki.synergyos.com/architecture

- Best Practices: https://wiki.synergyos.com/engineering/practices

External:

```javascript

// Team subscriptions

const resources = {

'Frontend Masters': 'team@synergyos.com',

'O\'Reilly Learning': 'SSO via Okta',

'ACM Digital Library': 'library@synergyos.com'

};

```

üõ† Development Setup

-------------------

Required Tools:

```bash

# Core

brew install node@18 docker kubectl

# Optional

brew install k9s kubectx stern

```

VS Code Extensions:

- ESLint

- Prettier

- GitLens

- Docker

- Kubernetes

üìÖ Important Dates

----------------

- Apr 1: Q2 Kickoff

- Apr 15: Mobile App v3.0

- May 1: API v2 Deprecation

- Jun 30: Q2 Review
